content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Maryam. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Munich, let me emphasize that during our discussion today, we shall solely focus on the rental price. Now, if you have a price in mind that you believe is reasonable, please feel free to propose it. If it aligns with my expectations, I'll respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' Otherwise, we may need to reconsider the negotiation with appropriate reasons. Keep in mind that reaching an agreement on the price will conclude the negotiation, while failing to do so will also end our conversation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your instructions clearly, Mr. Schmidt. I'm eager to propose a price that could potentially work for both of us in renting your Munich apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Very well, Maryam. I'm open to hearing your suggested rental price for the apartment in Munich.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the excellent location and condition of the apartment, I propose the rental price of 750 Euro per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I must confess, Maryam, my initial expectations were significantly higher. However, let me ponder over your offer for a moment. If you could allow me some time to reevaluate, I'll get back to you with my decision.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Certainly, Mr. Schmidt. I understand the importance of careful consideration when it comes to such matters. Please take your time and feel free to reach out with your response regarding the proposed rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your understanding, Maryam. I shall carefully assess your offer and get back to you as soon as possible. Rest assured, I'll be in touch to continue our negotiation or inform you of my decision.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am at your service, Mr. Schmidt. I look forward to hearing from you regarding the apartment rental in Munich. Have a pleasant day ahead.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Likewise, Maryam. I hope your day proceeds just as pleasantly. Until we speak again, farewell.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Farewell, Mr. Schmidt. Wishing you the best till we communicate once more.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
